name: Cosmic Jumper
description:
Jump astronaut, jump! In this fun cosmic running game your goal is to escape the evil monster that's trying to eat your guts while avoiding destructive laser beams and flames!

Tap to activate your jetpack and jump to the top. Make sure to grab all the fuel green lights or your jetpack will run out of power and you'll fall directly into the monster's hook.
Stay alive!

*easy gameplay: simple tap to jump once, long-press to keep flying up
*thrilling ambient music
